description:
OverviewTek Republic 12 in 1 USB Card Reader supports 12 popular memory card formats such as SD, SDHC, microSD, microSDHC, Mini SD, MMC, Memory Stick, and MS Duo. With USB 3.0 super-speed file transfers(up to 5Gbps) from memory cards instantly to your PC, Mac or Linux.DesignLight Weight & Portable features 3 slots card reader supports All Secure Digital (SD), MultiMediaCard (MMC), and Memory Stick (MS) Card Types.PerformanceProviding data rates of up to 5Gbps - 10 times faster than USB 2.0.PowerThe portable hub is bus powered and it does not require the connection of an external power adapter.
adapter.CompatibilityCompatible with Windows XP, Vista, 7/8, Mac OS X V 10.3.9 or above, and Linux. Fully backward compatibility with USB 1.1 hosts and devices.What's in the BoxTUC-300 USB 3.0 Card ReaderSpecificationsCable Length: 4"Dimensions: 2.6 x 1 x 0.6 inchesWeight: 2oz
title: Tek Republic TUC-300 Portable 12-in-1 USB 3.0 Card Reader
